languages.text: {n}Желваки ходят под кожей проктора, он буравит губернатора тяжелым и холодным взглядом.{/n} "Виновна".
{n}Solomorne's jaw tenses, his cold and heavy gaze boring into the governor.{/n} "Guilty."
languages.original_text: {n}Желваки ходят под кожей проктора, он буравит губернатора тяжелым и холодным взглядом.{/n} "Виновна".

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙紧绷着下巴，冷漠、沉重的目光盯着总督。{/n}“有罪。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's jaw tenses, his cold and heavy gaze boring into the governor.{/n} "Guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙紧绷着下巴，冷漠、沉重的目光盯着总督。{/n}“有罪。”

languages.text: {n}La mandíbula de Solomorne se tensa y su mirada gélida y pesada atraviesa a la gobernadora.{/n} «Culpable».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's jaw tenses, his cold and heavy gaze boring into the governor.{/n} "Guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mandíbula de Solomorne se tensa y su mirada gélida y pesada atraviesa a la gobernadora.{/n} «Culpable».

languages.text: {n}La mâchoire de Solomorne se crispe tandis qu'il pose un regard glacial sur la gouverneure.{/n} « Coupable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's jaw tenses, his cold and heavy gaze boring into the governor.{/n} "Guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mâchoire de Solomorne se crispe tandis qu'il pose un regard glacial sur la gouverneure.{/n} « Coupable. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの顎が固く引き締まり、その冷たく重い視線が総督を射抜いた。{/n}「有罪」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's jaw tenses, his cold and heavy gaze boring into the governor.{/n} "Guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの顎が固く引き締まり、その冷たく重い視線が総督を射抜いた。{/n}「有罪」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un çenesi geriliyor, soğuk ve ağır bakışlarıyla valiyi delip geçiyor.{/n} "Suçlu."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's jaw tenses, his cold and heavy gaze boring into the governor.{/n} "Guilty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un çenesi geriliyor, soğuk ve ağır bakışlarıyla valiyi delip geçiyor.{/n} "Suçlu."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne spannt den Kiefer an, sein kalter, schwerer Blick durchbohrt die Gouverneurin.{/n} "Schuldig."
